name: load_data_brick
title: Data Jumper
description: Optimizes large scale big data projects where several gigabytes of IO is being used. The Load Data app automatically threads and caches IO parameters passed to it allows for asychronous file reads and write validation. WARNING: Not currently compatible with images, for an image parser take a look at ImageMagik.

parameters.name: load_data_brick_dataset
parameters.description: Dataset of a gooddata project to be loaded.

parameters.name: load_data_brick_path
parameters.description: Where to find the file with data or inline the data. currently only comma separated, " quoted, CSV format with header is supported.
